name: Ishaan Srivastava
title: Autonomous Rover Project Member
bio: I've always been fascinated by space; in fact, I first chose to become an engineer because I dreamed of designing a new generation of air and spacecraft. In an age where there is little of the Earth left to discover, one naturally looks to the stars, and I hope to do my own part in making space colonisation less of a dream, and more of a reality.
